Header.title: Qiskit Fall Fest 2024
Header.paragraph: IBM In Partnership with the GDG OAU Quantum Computing Club At Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife

About.paragraph: This event is designed to bring together enthusiasts and beginners in quantum computing and tech innovation. Whether you're interested in learning the basics of Qiskit, participating in coding challenges, or hearing from industry experts, this challenge has something for everyone. With a hackathon, workshops, expert talks, and networking opportunities, you’ll dive deep into cutting-edge technology while building valuable connections. Don't miss this opportunity to expand your skills and explore the future of quantum computing! Join us for the 24-day learning challenge (October 18 - November 10, 2024), featuring a dynamic mix of activities around quantum computing and tech innovation.
Why: Gain insights from industry experts, including a speakers from IBM.
Participate in coding challenges for all levels and a short-timed quiz competition.
Networking and Demo: Enjoy a demo showcasing quantum computing’s potential, recorded IBM talks, and networking opportunities.
Why2: Additional Materias in the 2024 Fall Fest Package

Features.title: 24-day Learning Challenge Kickoff
Features.text: Join us for the 24-day learning challenge (October 18 - November 10, 2024), featuring a dynamic mix of activities around quantum computing and tech innovation.

Features.title: Beginner-level Hackathon
Features.text: Beginner-friendly hackathon beginning on November 14 to November 19, with projects due three days before the event. Winners will be announced on the final day, with certificates and prizes.

Features.title: Short-timed Quiz Competition
Features.text: Test your skills with coding challenges for all levels and a short-timed quiz competition.

Features.title: IBM and Club Leads Talks
Features.text: Hear from industry experts, including speakers from IBM, the Quantum Computing Lead, and the GDG on Campus Lead.

Schedules.title: Opening Ceremony
Schedules.text: Join us for the opening ceremony, where we'll introduce the event and the speakers.

Schedules.title: Workshop
Schedules.text: Learn the basics of Qiskit and quantum computing in this beginner-friendly workshop.

Schedules.title: Coding Challenge
Schedules.text: Participate in coding challenges for all levels and a short-timed quiz competition.

Schedules.title: Networking and Demo
Schedules.text: Enjoy a demo showcasing quantum computing’s potential, recorded IBM talks, and networking opportunities.
